items.title: Schumer's nightmare scenario: Mamdani's win rekindles rumblings of AOC primary showdown
items.description: Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's resounding election win is giving Senate Democratic leader Charles E. Schumer plenty to worry about.

items.title: Gallup poll finds record-high optimism about war on drugs
items.description: Record-high shares of Americans believe the country has made progress in the war on drugs, according to the latest Gallup polling released Wednesday.
